ai-patthana21.45:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.45:0.3_0: Talking forgets, relying on charming eyes,
ai-patthana21.45:1.1_0: Not knowing the teaching or training, no residing in fact that arises conditioned by someone else.
ai-patthana21.45:1.1_1: Not knowing the teaching or training, no residing in fact that someone else gives rise to satisfaction, not for any other reason.
ai-patthana21.45:1.1_2: Not knowing the teachings that are in fact, or two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, or fifty.
ai-patthana21.45:2.1_0: not for the sake of deceiving or flattering.
ai-patthana21.45:3.1_0: don’t ask how to understand how to get lodgings, or tormented, or tormenting, or tormenting, or tormenting them, or turning them away.
ai-patthana21.45:4.1_0: Nor do I have any inquiry, (called) species of repulsion, and nine labels.
ai-patthana21.45:4.1_1: Nor can I ask a question for nine projects.
ai-patthana21.45:5.1_0: Nine things are the nine projects. ...
